Two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes/NCE to include 
CRS/Religious Studies.  
  
Five (5) SSCcredit passes in 
English Language, CRS and 
three (3) other relevant 
subjects.  
  
Two (2) Arts 
subjects including 
CRS and any other 
subject.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) ABUJA accepts a minimum of ten (10) points in 
NCE merit or NDupper creditin addition to 
theUTME requirements.   
(ii) AJAYI and IBADAN accept NCE Merit in Religious 
Studies.   
(iii) ILORIN accepts ND in Religious Studies or  
Theology of London or an accredited Nigerian 
University or Affiliated institutions.   
(iv) KWASU accepts IJMB, Cambridge and NCE.   
(v) LASU accepts  
a) two (2) 'A' level passes, including CRS  or 
Religious Studies at not more than two (2) 
sittings, plus five (5) 'O' level credit passes or 
its equivalent, including English Language at 
not more than two (2) sittings.   
b) NCE Merit in CRS and five (5) 'O' leve l credit 
passes in other relevant subjects including 
English Language.   
(vi) LASU and OOU also require fulfillment of the 
UTME requirements.   
(vii) NASARAWA accepts NCE merit in CRS.  
  
UTME  
(i) EKSU requires only Arts subjects.   
(ii) KASU accepts only subjects from Arts or Social 
Sciences.  
(iii) LASU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
including English Language.   
(iv) TSUJ accepts 'O' level pass in Mathematics.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  DIRECT ENTRY  UTME
